summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.2°C) and outside temperature (down 5.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 617 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1568 m), feels like temperature (up 8.1°C), outside temperature (up 6.8°C), and dew point temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 617.0m lower than yesterday, 577.4m lower than the past week, 1567.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1107.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1684.6m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. Changeable conditions.
